section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: asin computes the inverse sine (arc sine) of the argument x. Arguments to asin must be in the range -1 to 1. asinf is identical to asin, other than taking and returning floats. You can modify error handling for these routines using matherr.

section.title: Returns
section.p: If x is not in the range -1 to 1, asin and asinf return NaN (not a number), set the global variable errno to EDOM, and issue a DOMAIN error message. You can change this error treatment using matherr.
